# Parwark

Parwark  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Stare Pole, within Malbork County, Pomeranian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south of Stare Pole,  east of Malbork, and  south-east of the regional capital Gda≈Ñsk.
For the history of the region, see History of Pomerania.
